mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title=#{review_title}, review_content=#{review_content}, review_photo=#{review_photo} WHERE review_no=#{review_no}
UPDATE review SET review_title=#{review_title}, review_content=#{review_content} WHERE review_no=#{review_no}
mapper.select: SELECT re.review_no, re.review_title, re.review_content, de.designer_name, d.dog_name, re.review_photo, re.resv_no, sc.sc_id, re.review_date FROM review re INNER JOIN resv rv ON rv.resv_no = re.resv_no INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id = d.dog_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON sc.resv_no = rv.resv_no INNER JOIN designer de ON de.designer_id = sc.designer_id WHERE rv.resv_fix = 1

SELECT re.review_no, re.review_title, re.review_content,de.designer_id, de.designer_name, d.dog_name, re.review_photo, re.resv_no, sc.sc_id, re.review_date FROM review re INNER JOIN resv rv ON rv.resv_no = re.resv_no INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id = d.dog_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON sc.resv_no = rv.resv_no INNER JOIN designer de ON de.designer_id = sc.designer_id WHERE rv.resv_fix = 1 and de.designer_id=#{designer_id}
SELECT COUNT(review_title) review_count FROM review WHERE useremail = #{useremail}
SELECT de.designer_id, de.designer_name FROM review re INNER JOIN designer de ON de.designer_id = re.designer_id WHERE re.designer_id is not null GROUP BY re.designer_id
SELECT resv_no, COUNT(review_no) AS reviewcount FROM review WHERE resv_no = #{resv_no}
SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY review_date desc LIMIT 3
